co.cask.cdap.etl.api.batch

Interface BatchJoinerContext

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BatchContext, DatasetContext, LookupProvider, StageContext, TransformContext

    @Beta
public interface BatchJoinerContext
extends BatchContext
    Context of a Batch Joiner

    • Method Detail

      • setNumPartitions

        void setNumPartitions(int numPartitions)
        Set the number of partitions to use to join values. If none is set, the execution engine will decide how many partitions to use.
        Parameters:
        numPartitions - the number of partitions to use when joining.

      • setJoinKeyClass

        void setJoinKeyClass(Class<?> joinKeyClass)
        Set the join key class. This is not required if the joiner is parameterized with a concrete class for the join key. This method is required if the join key class is only known at configure time versus compile time. For example, an joiner may support joining on a configurable record field, and not know the type of that field until configure time.
        Parameters:
        joinKeyClass - the join key class

      • setJoinInputRecordClass

        void setJoinInputRecordClass(Class<?> joinInputRecordClass)
        Set the join input record class. This is not required if the joiner is parameterized with a concrete class for the join input. This method is required if the input record class is only known at configure time versus compile time.
        Parameters:
        joinInputRecordClass - the join input record class
